name: Amphibious Form
summary: Your eidolon adapts to life on land and underwater.
description:
Your eidolon adapts to life on land and underwater. It gains the amphibious trait, allowing it to breathe in water and air and to avoid the normal â€“2 penalty for making bludgeoning and slashing unarmed Strikes underwater. It gains a swim Speed equal to its land Speed or 25 feet, whichever is less; or if it is normally aquatic, it gains a land Speed equal to its swim Speed or 25 feet, whichever is less.Traits

Evolution: Feats with this trait affect your eidolon instead of you, typically by granting it additional physical capabilities.
